name: Salade Panachee (Mixed green salad)
recipeIngredient: 1 red, ripe tomato, cored and cut in eighths
1 tablespoon imported mustard such as Dijon or Dusseldorf

recipeInstructions.text: Core Boston lettuce and separate leaves. Trim off tough stems of watercress. Rinse greens and shake off excess moisture. Put greens in salad bowl and add tomato and radishes.
Blend vinegar, minced garlic and mustard in mixing bowl. Stir with whisk, gradually adding oil. Add salt and pepper to taste.
Pour dressing over the greens and toss.
